name: Hir Corruption
description:
[Mental Channel Open]
Hey?
Someone's there?
I need your help.

YOU must help Nuri escape the evil version of the strange hotel called “Lovers' Eden”, while keeping a close eye to hir “Corruption”.

Features

  • A short (1.656 words) interactive story written in Ren'py, with various endings.
  • And Steam Achievements.
  • Bilingual UI!
